name: Chinese Dulcimer VR
description:
Real Chinese Dulcimer Example:

Project Description Page:
http://www.gamesstudio.org/games/chinese-dulcimer-vr

You can learn and play Chinese Dulcimer in VR!

Three Different Game Mode:
- Practice Note
- Learn Songs
- Free to play 

Features:
- Import custom music sheet into the game
- Learn to play Chinese dulcimer in practice mode.

Chinese Dulcimer 3D model created in Maya.
